fields.name: What is Kishimoto Inu?
fields.value: Anime&Inu based ERC20 Token on the Ethereum Blockchain ([link](https://etherscan.io/token/0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65 "https://etherscan.io/token/0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65")). The **Whitepaper** explains the value of the project which can be found [here](https://kishimotoinu.com/KishimotoInuwhitepaper.pdf "https://kishimotoinu.com/KishimotoInuwhitepaper.pdf")

fields.name: What is the address of the contract?
I have a proposal, who can I contact?
Why did I receive less tokens than I bought?
fields.value:
Each buy/sell is taxed by 10%.
- 5% Marketing
- 3% Liquidity to prevent whale manipulation
- 2% Rewards (reflections) are distributed to every hodler in proportion to the wallets amount

fields.name: Why are the token prices different on centralized exchanges?
fields.value: Centralized exchanges (*CEXs*) have there own order book that must be reconciled between the buys and sells for that particular asset and for each pairing

fields.name: How many tokens are in circulation and how many are already burnt?
fields.value:
-	Total amount of Kishimoto Inu tokens: 100.000.000.000.000.000
-	**50%** initially burnt. Tokens are burnt on every transaction because the burn wallet is also a hodler which receives reflections ([link](https://etherscan.io/token/0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65?a=0x000000000000000000000000000000000000dead "https://etherscan.io/token/0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65?a=0x000000000000000000000000000000000000dead"))
-	**~48%** are in circulation currently it will decrease slowly

fields.name: Which wallets can be used to store Kishimoto Inu tokens?
fields.value: Any wallets that accept ERC20 Token can be used.

fields.name: Why canâ€™t I see my token balance increase in my wallet? Am I not receiving reflections?
fields.value:
CEX usually dont provide reflection to their customers but there are exceptions. 
If you want to know if your wallet receives reflections copy the link below and fill in your wallet address.
https://etherscan.io/token/0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65?a=YOUR_WALLET_ADDRESS

fields.name: When purchasing Kishimoto Inu tokens on a DEX, what should my slippage tolerance be set to?
fields.value: Slippage should be 12-15% for further questions go to <#900975814336712714> community member will help :ninja:

fields.name: Where can I buy Kishimoto Inu?
fields.value:
On our own DEX [KishiSwap](https://kishiswap.com/swap?outputCurrency=0xf5b1Fd29d23e98Db2D9EBb8435E1082e3B38FB65 "Kishiswap") or on any  DEXs and CEXs which are listed below.

*Decentralized Exchanges (DEXs)*:
-	[Uniswap](https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?exactField=input&exactAmount=10&outputCurrency=0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65 "Uniswap")
-	[ShibaSwap](https://shibaswap.com/#/swap?outputCurrency=0xf5b1Fd29d23e98Db2D9EBb8435E1082e3B38FB65 "Shibaswap")
-	[FEGex](https://fegex.com/ "FEGex")

*Centralized Exchanges:*
-	[Hotbit](https://www.hotbit.io/exchange?symbol=KISHIMOTO_nUSD "Hotbit")
-	[Lbank](https://www.lbank.info/exchange/kishimoto/usdt "Lbank")
-	[BKEX](https://www.bkex.com/trade/KISHIMOTO_USDT "Bkex")
-	[ZT](https://www.ztb.im/exchange?coin=KISHIMOTO_USDT "Zt")
-	[XT](https://www.xt.com/ "Xt")
-	[WhiteBit](https://whitebit.com/trade/KISHI_DECL "WhiteBit")
